rows.author: Maxime Larrivée-Roy
rows.name: Joseph Facal
rows.description: Il écrit des chromiques méchantes
rows.flavor: J'ai un ami noir

rows.author: Philippe
rows.name: Charles Tisseyre
rows.description:
Flying

Whenever Charles Tisseyre attacks, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{1}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your library.
rows.flavor: "Let us journey together through the wonders of the universe — one step closer to understanding."

rows.author: Tom Cast
rows.name: Alexis Crossette Strudel
rows.description:
After summoning Alexis Crossette Strudel, search your library for the « Tiroir d’Alexis » and put it into play.

Put X token from the « Tiroir d’Alexis » into play.
rows.flavor: « On dis qu’il répand les rumeurs de mauvaises augures pour y remplir un classeur. Ce classeur contient plusieurs tiroirs.. »

rows.author: Jonathan Doucet
rows.name: Les buffets chinois Magnotta
rows.description: Simple land, dans le style humour noir, ajoute 1{B} au mana pool

rows.author: Jonathan Doucet
rows.name: Convoi de la Libarté
rows.description:
Le convoi de la Libarté! n'entre sur le champ de bataille que si tu ne portes aucune protection (masque,gant,cervelle) 

{T} ajoute {R}: Crie "LIBARTÉ!!!!" a pleine voix. Si tu le fais, jusqu'a la fin de ton tour, les créatures que tu contrôles gagne +1/0 et aquiert menace. Si tu refuses de crier, sacrifie ce terrain
rows.flavor: Je roule pour mes droits, pis j'bloque les tiens.

rows.author: Steve Gagnon
rows.name: Cocothon de Laval
rows.description:
when Cocothon de Laval comes in play, all creatures get Frenzy.
Frenzy: creature hits its right opponent with a wooping 5 and trample. 
Dead creatures just get tap.
rows.flavor: "Les clôtures sont tombées et un bruit immense est monté de la foule qui s'est mis à courir vers les oeufs"

rows.author: Pierre
rows.name: Drainville, Master of Neglection
rows.description:
Fear

As long as Drainville is in play, School cards can't be regenerated.
rows.flavor: "C'est bien mieux un troisième lien!"

rows.author: Philippe
rows.name: Découverte
rows.description:
At the beginning of your draw step, you may reveal the top card of your library.
— If it’s a noncreature card, draw an additional card.
— If it’s a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
— Otherwise, you gain 2 life.

Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may pay {1}. If you do, look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
rows.flavor: "Découverte takes us where curiosity becomes wonder."

rows.author: Vincent
rows.name: St Epstein, Ange Gardien
rows.description: {UB}{6} St. Jeffrey can only be summoned on an Island land card, all pedophile subtype characters in play will automatically redirect any damage taken to St. Jeffrey
rows.flavor: “Welcome to my island”

rows.author: Philippe
rows.name: Charles Ti-Cerf, Grove Guide
rows.description:
First Strike, Vigilance

Whenever Charles Ti-Cerf attacks or blocks, you may look at the top card of your library. If it’s a land or a noncreature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Otherwise, you may put it into your graveyard.

{1}{G}{U}, {T}: Explore twice. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put it into your hand if it’s a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then you may put that card into your graveyard.)
rows.flavor: "Half whisper, half forest call — his wisdom echoes through the deepest woods."

image.filename: ChatGPT Image 9 juill. 2025, 12 h 05 min 19 s.png

rows.author: Charles Castonguay
rows.name: Lucien Bouchard, Stern Motivator
rows.description:
Vigilance

When Lucien Bouchard, Stern Motivator enters, you may put a lazy counter on each creature you control.

{T}: Untap up to three target creatures with a lazy counter on it. They gain +2/+2 until end of turn.
rows.flavor:
"Va travailler, espèce de paresseux!"
 - Lucien Bouchard, Stern Motivator

rows.author: Maxime Larrivée-Roy
rows.name: Northvolt
rows.description: asdf

image.filename: ChatGPT Image 5 juill. 2025, 23 h 06 min 59 s.png

rows.author: Simon B
rows.name: Pizza Salvatoré
rows.flavor: "Ce podcast est une présentation de Pizza Salvatoré!"

image.filename: ChatGPT Image 5 juill. 2025, 23 h 23 min 10 s.png
ChatGPT Image 6 juill. 2025, 17 h 43 min 04 s.png

rows.author: Maxime Larrivée-Roy
rows.name: asdf
rows.description: asdf
rows.flavor: asdf

image.filename: Runway 2025-05-06T01_30_05.094Z Upscale Image Upscaled Image 3419 x 1920.jpg

rows.author: Steve Gagnon
rows.name: Mars
rows.description:
When Mars comes in play, it generate a Rocket token. The token is assignated to the player with the most lands.

Rocket to Mars: roll a 6 faces dice. 1 = the rocket explode 2 = the rocket crashe on Mars 3 = the player survive on Mars until his oxygen tank is empty 4= the player survive but cannot come back 5 = other billionaires join the player to all find out they cannot eat money 6 = the player survive the return on Earth
rows.flavor: "Si j'avais su..."

image.filename: ChatGPT Image 6 juill. 2025, 22 h 01 min 42 s.png

rows.author: Maxime Larrivée-Roy
rows.name: Thetford Mines
rows.description: asdf
rows.flavor: asdf

image.filename: ChatGPT Image 9 juill. 2025, 21 h 36 min 12 s.png

rows.author: Maxime Larrivée-Roy
rows.name: Anticosti Island
rows.description: asdf
rows.flavor: asdf

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Perlin, Construction Worker
rows.description:
Defender
When Perlin, Construction Worker enters, create a 0/1 white Jobless Worker creature token with Defender.
At the beginning of your turn, if you control no tapped lands, Perlin, Construction Worker becomes Unemployed. (He loses all abilities until end of turn).
Tap three untapped Civilians you control: Create a 1/1 white Day Laborer creature token with Vigilance.
rows.flavor: “Maudit chômage!”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Chef Groleau
rows.description:
Menace

At the beginning of your end step, create a Crastillon artifact token for each opponent.

Whenever Chef Groleau attacks, each opponent loses 1 life for each Crastillon they control.
rows.flavor: “C’est pas grave si ça fait des mottons, parce c’est les mottons qui goûtent le plus bons!”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Trudeau’s Kick in the Schnolles
rows.description: Trudeau’s Kick in the Schnolles deals 2 damage to target creature. If you control a black permanent, destroy that creature instead.
rows.flavor: “Monsieur Trudeau, une p’tite devinette là: PET pis répète s’en vont en bateau, PET tombe à l’eau, qui c’est qui a l’goût de l’sauver?”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Jean-Jacques, The Peacock
rows.description:
When Jean-Jacques, The Peacock enters, scry 1.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Jean-Jacques, The Peacock just can’t do it. (He can’t attack this turn).

{U}: Jean-Jacques, The Peacock gains hexproof until end of turn.
rows.flavor: “Une femme, c’est comme un fruit…il faut savoir quand le cueillir.”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Gérard, The Bull
rows.description:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice a permanent - Gérard, The Bull got caught cheating again!

Whenever Gérard, The Bull attacks, it gains deathtouch until end of turn and the player attacked discard a card at random.
rows.flavor: “Le chat lui a mangé la la-langue? He he he!”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Patrice, The Lion
rows.description:
Haste

Whenever Patrice, The Lion attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Patrice, The Lion gains double strike until end of turn. If you lose the flip, sacrifice him at the beginning of the next end step and discard a card at random.

{I}Overstimulated{/I} - As long as you’ve discarded a card this turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
rows.flavor: “C’est pas moé qui est trop intense, c’est le monde qui est trop mou!”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Serge, The Earthworm
rows.description:
Whenever Serge, The Earthworm becomes the target of a spell or ability, he gains Shyness. (Tap it until end of turn).

Whenever Serge, The Earthworm becomes tapped, flip a coin. If you win the flip, untap Serge, The Earthworm and draw a card. Otherwise, nothing happens.
rows.flavor: “J’l’ai regardée…elle m’a regardée…j’l’ai re-regardée…pis j’suis tombé.”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: I’m Done!
rows.description: Exchange control of target creature you control and target creature you don’t control.
rows.flavor: “C’était une erreur, une grave erreur, mais elle est humaine.”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Château Ragoût
rows.description:
{4}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life and get a poison counter. 
{i}(When a player has ten or more poison counters, that player loses the game.){/I}
rows.flavor: ”C’est du Château Ragoût 1987… une très bonne année, y’avait pas eu d’verglas!”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Unplanned Sphincter Release
rows.description: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
rows.flavor: “Un peu oué!”

rows.author: François Simard
rows.name: Raël, Crosseur Prophet
rows.description:
Flying

{i}Clone Worship{/i} - At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature token, create a copy of that token.

{i}False Prophet{/i} - Whenever Raël, Crosseur Prophet becomes the target of a spell or ability, each opponent may draw a card. If they do, you lose 1 life.

{i}Cult of Confusion{/I} - {1}{U}{B}: Gain control of target tapped creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it.
rows.flavor: ”Les Élohim m’ont dit que j’étais le dernier des prophètes, mais aussi le plus sexy.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Le coup de douze dans la bol
rows.description:
Coups de Douze dans la Bol inflige 3 blessures à chaque créature non volante.
Les créatures touchées sont considérées comme souillées jusqu’à la fin du tour.
(Elles ne peuvent ni attaquer ni bloquer.)

Si un joueur a mangé du fast-food pendant cette partie, il perd 2 points de vie.
rows.flavor: "Ashton : là où le plaisir finit... et la guerre intestinale commence."

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Grotte de St-Elzéar
rows.description:
Grotte de St-Elzéar comes into play tapped.
T: Add R
{i}Fais noir icitte!{/i} - {3}, T: Sacrifice Grotte de St-Elzéar. Search your library for a Swamp and put it into play tapped.
rows.flavor: Viens voir les belles concrétions!

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: S’Quatre novembre au soir
rows.description: {i}Confusion{/i} - Target player mills two cards, draws two cards and lose 2 life.
rows.flavor: “Ça ne vaut pas vraiment la peine de commenter, mais je drais, voudrais vous dire…que…le s’quatre novembre au soir (…)”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Drunken Teenager
rows.description: Haste
rows.flavor: “Mon père…mon père y est riche en tabarnak!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Centre Videoétron
rows.flavor: “Ce n’est pas parce qu’il y a un bel amphithéâtre que l’expansion est garantie.” - Gary Bettman

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Gossiping Office Workers
rows.description: {W}, T: Tap target creature.
rows.flavor: “Es-tu satisfait de ton salaire toi?”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Pharmacie Client
rows.description: Deathtouch
rows.flavor: “Avez-vous ça les nouvelles Doritos Chili Delicious jaune-orange là extra salsa piquante aux pickles fromage western euh…jumbo?”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Manquablement!
rows.description: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains Trample until end of turn.
rows.flavor: “Enfant d’chienne!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Municipal Waste in the St-Laurent
rows.description: Destroy target land.
rows.flavor: “Ce n’étais pas écris huit milliards de litres d’eaux usées, mais bout d’viarge quand on parle d’un tunnel de cinq mètres de diamètre et qu’on dit que pendant sept jours il va y avoir un déversement, il doit y avoir un certain montant de litres qui son comme pas mal, tsé.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Police Brutality
rows.description: Police Brutality deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
rows.flavor: “Ayoye, svp!” - Bonhomme

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Kidnapping Bonhomme
rows.description:
Enchant Creature
Enchanted creature can’t attack or block.
Enchanted creature has “{2}, Sacrifice this creature: you gain 2 life.”
rows.flavor: “Tu me prends-tu pour une valise?!” - Bob Binette

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Passe-Carreau, Spirit of Nature
rows.description:
{i}On va faire une belle surprise!{/i} - When Passe-Carreau, Spirit of Nature enters, create a 1/1 green Illusion creature token for each non-token creature you control.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may tap an Illusion you control. If you do, add one mana of any color and gain 2 life.
{i}On va partager!{/i} - T, Illusions you control get +1/+1 and gain Hexproof until end of turn.
rows.flavor: “Ferme tes yeux et imagine!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Kémion-Eating Soulier
rows.description:
When Kémion-Eating Soulier enters, exile up to one target artifact with mana value 2 or less.
Whenever an artifact card is exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Kémion-Eating Soulier.
Kémion-Eating Soulier has trample as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
rows.flavor: “Je vais tout les manger ces sept camions là!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Passe-Montagne, Defender of Nature
rows.description:
Forestwalk
{i}Endosse la cause de la hausse{/i} - Whenever a Student creature enters under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{i}Marcher dans l’bois{/i} - T: Gain life equal to the number of green creatures you control.
rows.flavor: “La nature, c’est pas compliqué, c’est juste vrai!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Damaged Shady Coffre
rows.description: Deals 2 damage to any target.
rows.flavor: “Moé j’pense que c’est toé ma p’tite fille qui l’a faite tomber!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Big Fat Légumes
rows.description:
Choose one:
- Create two food tokens and put them into play
- Gain 3 life
rows.flavor:
“Miam, miam, miam, les bons gros légumes
Miam, miam, miam, j’ai hâte d’en manger”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Ariel Grenier, Carrés Verts Leader
rows.description:
Ward - Discard a card.
{i}Pour la hausse{/i} - At the beginning of each player’s end step, if that player cast two or more spells this turn, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
{i}Carrés rouges{/i} - Tap two untapped Politician you control: Tap target Student. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
rows.flavor: “Il n’y a personne qui va m’empêcher d’assister à mes cours, et cette personne n’est pas encore née!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Hot Diggity Dogger
rows.description:
Reach
{i}Splash d’huile chaude{/i} - Whenever you cast a noncreature artifact spell, Hot Diggity Dogger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{i}Trip bouffe{/i} - {2}, T: Create a Food token. If you control three or more Foods, untap Hot Diggity Dogger.
rows.flavor: “Forgé dans le metal. Énergisé par les saucisses. La terreur des vegans.

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Fardoche, Protector of Nature
rows.description:
First Strike
{i}Je pousse sous terre{/i} - Whenever a land enters, create a 1/1 white Livestock creature token and put it into play under your control.
{i}Les animaux, faut les respecter{/i} - Tap two untapped Livestock creatures you control: Fardoche, Protector of Nature deals 3 damage to any target.
rows.flavor: “Moé, j’suis un gars de la terre, pis je l’aimd ma terre!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Spirit of Pierre Falardeau
rows.description:
Flying, Vigilance
{i}C’est d’même que j’parle!”{/i} - Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, if it targets a creature you control, you may draw a card.
{i}Le temps des bouffons”{/i} - At the beginning of each end step, if a permanent you control left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 white Activist creature token with Vigilance and put it into play under your control.
rows.flavor: “On va toujours trop loin pour les gens qui vont nulle part.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Michèle Courchesne, Dark Ministre
rows.description:
Ward - Pay 2 life
{i}Carrés rouges{/i} - Whenever a Student creature enters under an opponent’s control, that player mills two cards and sacrifices a creature unless they pay {2}.
{U}{B}: Tap target Student creature.
rows.flavor: “Il y a un point où il faut dire la vérité: ce n’est plus une grève étudiante, c’est un mouvement politique.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Axl Rose, Rock Diva
rows.description:
Haste, Menace
When Axl Rose, Rock Diva enters, each player loses 2 life.
If Axl Rose, Rock Diva leaves the battlefield, search your library for a card named Concert Riot and put it into your hand.
rows.flavor: “This is bullshit, I’m outta here!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Concert Riot
rows.description: Destroy target Artifact or Land.
rows.flavor: Metallica-Guns n’ Roses, Stade Olympique de Montréal, 8 août 1992.

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Capitaine Cosmos
rows.description:
Flying, Vigilance
{i}Sagesse cosmique{/i} - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card pf your library. If it’s a noncreature card, you may reveal it, put it into your hand and gain 2 life. Otherwise, draw a card.
rows.flavor: “Dans l’univers, tout est question d’équilibre. Même la plus petite étincelle peut illuminer les ténèbres.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Hockey Miracle
rows.description: Untap target Hockey Player creature. It gains +2/+2 until end of turn.
rows.flavor: “Let’s go Jimmy, t’es capable!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Jacques Mercier
rows.description:
Hockey Player you control have Vigilance.
Whenever a Hockey Player creature you control attack, draw a card.
rows.flavor: “Le hockey, c’est pas une game de stats, c’est une game de coeur!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Shameful Coach’s Speech
rows.description: Return target Hockey Player creature to it’s owner hand.
rows.flavor: “Des gars d’même ça m’fait vomir quand j’les regarde, ça pas d’place dans mon équipe! Ça mérite pas d’avoir un uniforme! Nounou! NOUNOU! Y a un chandail icitte que j’peux plus sentir, qui m’écoeure. Le numéro 13, décroche-moi ça tu suite!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Marc Gagnon
rows.description:
Vigilance
{i}Vétéran qui a donné son sang pour l’équipe{/i} - When Marc Gagnon attacks, it get +1/+0 and First Strike.
rows.flavor: “Si tu veux scorer, faut que t’ailles dans l’traffic!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Gilles Guilbeault
rows.description:
Hockey Player creatures you control get +1/+0.
{i}Le National de Québec{/i} - {U}, T: During your turn, add one mana of any color for each Hockey Player you control.
rows.flavor: “Arrête, arrête, arrête m’a brailler!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Pierre Lambert
rows.description:
First Strike
If Pierre Lambert becomes blocked, put a -1/-0 Blessure counter on it.
rows.flavor: “Même quand je serai devenu une vedette, je resterai toujours le p’tit Pierre à sa Ginette.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Services publiques on strike
rows.description:
All Politician creatures get -2/-0.
{1}{G}: Tap target Politician or Civilian creature.
rows.flavor: “En 2023, 691 grèves ont paralysé le Québec, un sommet historique. En 2024, ce chiffre a encore grimpé, à 759. Près de 9 grèves sur 10, soit 87 % de ces conflits de travail, ont eu lieu dans les secteurs publiques.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Bobépine
rows.description:
Haste
{i}Térébentine Breath{/i} - When Bobépine enters, it deals 1 damage to any target.
rows.flavor:
“A s’parfume à térébentine
A couraille la rue Sainte-Catherine”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Spirit of Dédé Fortin
rows.description:
All Bard creatures get +1/+1.
{i}Belzébuth{/i} - When Spirit of Dédé Fortin attacks, create a tapped and attacking green and white Cat Spirit 2/1 creature token.
rows.flavor:
“Ouais ben l’amour, la mort pis toute
C’est des questions trop grandes pour moé
Pis à part de ça le monde entier 
Veut juste savoir combien ça coûte”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Monique Jérôme-Forget, Dark Ministre
rows.description:
{i}Je ménage ma sacoche{/i} - Whenever Monique Jérôme-Forget, Dark Ministre attacks, you may sacrifice a Fonctionnaire or Civilian creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{i}PPP{/i} - If a player casts a white or green spells, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, that player must pays an additionnal {2} for it.
rows.flavor: “C’était pas assez prestigieux, ça ne m’intéressait pas.”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Spirit of Gerry Boulet
rows.description:
Flying
All Bard creatures you control get +2/+2 and Flying.
{W}{W}: Put this card from your graveyard to your hand.
rows.flavor: “Vous m’avez monter un beau grand bateau!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Ralph, St-Jean-de-Bosco
rows.description:
As Ralph, St-Jean-de-Bosco comes into play, choose one:
{i}Coupe la parole{/i} - This creature gains First Strike
{i} Heille, heille, heille!{/i} - This creature gains a +1/+1 counter
rows.flavor: “Euh…le rectum!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Killer, St-Jean-de-Bosco
rows.description:
As Killer, St-Jean-de-Bosco comes into play, choose one:
{i}Répond trop vite{/i} - This creature gains Haste
{i}Bo Derek!{i} - This creature gains a +1/+1 counter
rows.flavor: “Bo Derek!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Wally, St-Jean-de-Bosco
rows.flavor: “Ouais!”

rows.author: Magic the Listerine
rows.name: Bonzo, St-Jean-de-Bosco
rows.description: Haste
rows.flavor: “Absent!”
